name: Aftermath (itch) (Bedanta)
description:
Roarth Harold, an well known detective, gets into a case. Someone murdered an Old Man! Who is it? How did he escape? How did the murder happen?

It's all upto Harold.

Play AFTERMATH, a game inspired by Capcom's greatest hit game ACE ATTORNEY, in a similar playstyle. Examine the scene, find clues, press alibis!

The truth is in your hand!
